documentation.text:
@title AEONMathTester
 @dev Test contract to expose AEONMathStandalone library functions for testing
@dev Calculate spread in basis points between two prices
@dev Check if spread is above threshold after accounting for fees
@dev Test helper: Get current block timestamp
@dev Test helper: Get current block number

@title MockPoolAddressesProvider
 @dev Mock implementation of AAVE's IPoolAddressesProvider for testing

@title MockPool
 @dev Mock implementation of AAVE's IPool for testing flash loans
@notice Calculates implied price from Balancer-style weighted pools
@notice Calculates spread in basis points between on-chain implied and off-chain oracle
@notice Compares spread to total fees (e.g. slippage + gas + LP)
@notice Calculates gas efficiency factor (for future use)

isAboveThreshold(int256,uint256).details: Check if spread is above threshold after accounting for fees
